pageProduct.name: Orzene Oil Balance Shampoo 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Orzene Beer Oil Balance Shampoo helps control greasiness, offering volume & shine.
Enriched with Shine Elixir,  consisting of Beer, Ceramides and Phytoprotein, as well as Oil balance Complex, specially developed with hop & rosemary extracts, this high performing shampoo cleanses hair, providing a fresh sensation.

 

Directions

Apply on wet hair and massage gently. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
